title: 存档属性强制
description: 应用于传入/传出DIMSE的存档属性强制

cn.title: 名称
cn.description: 强制存档属性的任意/有意义的名称

dcmRulePriority.title: 规则优先级
dcmRulePriority.description: 规则优先级 Higher priority rule applied.

dcmDIMSE.title: DIMSE
dcmDIMSE.description: 应用此属性强制的DICOM消息元素

dcmSOPClass.title: SOP类UID
dcmSOPClass.description: 应用此属性强制的SOP类的UID。如果不存在,请将其应用于任何SOP类

dcmProperty.title: 条件
dcmProperty.description: (SendingHostname|SendingApplicationEntityTitle|ReceivingHostname|ReceivingApplicationEntityTitle|{AttributeTagOrKeyword[number]}|{SequenceTagOrKeyword.AttributeTagOrKeyword})[!]={regEx}格式的条件。通过用“|”符号分隔,可以为特定属性指定多个值。示例:SendingApplicationEntityTitle=FORWARD或Modality=MRCT或ProcedureCodeSequence.CodeValue=MRProcedure或00180015=KNEE或00321034.00080100=RequestingServiceCode或ImageType[3]=LOCALIZER

dcmRetrieveAsReceived.title: 读取为接收
dcmRetrieveAsReceived.description: 禁止将DB信息合并到读取的复合对象中,并返回接收的对象。仅对DIMSE=C_STORE_RQ和DICOM传输角色=SCP有效

dcmDeIdentification.title: 匿名化
dcmDeIdentification.description: 根据DICOM PS3.15中指定的基本应用程序级机密性配置文件对对象进行匿名化。 如果选择任何选项,则隐式包含基本的应用程序级敏感度配置文件

dcmURI.title: XSL样式表URI
dcmURI.description: 指定属性强制的XSL样式表URI

dcmNoKeywords.title: 无属性关键字
dcmNoKeywords.description: 指示是否应该在传递到XSLT的DICOM XML中省略属性关键字

dcmMergeMWLMatchingKey.title: 合并MWL匹配键
dcmMergeMWLMatchingKey.description: 查找用于强制请求属性的MWL项目,指定接收对象的属性。 如果不存在,则不会强制接收对象的请求属性 PatientID - Patient ID and Accession Number considered for querying MWLs. If Accession Number not available in object attributes, only Patient ID considered for querying MWLs. PatientIDOnly - Only Patient ID considered for querying MWLs. PatientIDAccessionNumber - Patient ID and Accession Number considered for querying MWLs. If Accession Number not available in object attributes, fall back to Study Instance UID. AccessionNumber - Only Accession Number considered for querying MWLs. StudyInstanceUID - Only Study Instance UID considered for querying MWLs. ScheduledProcedureStepID - Scheduled Procedure Step ID and Study Instance UID considered for querying MWLs.

dcmMergeMWLTemplateURI.title: 合并MWL模板URI
dcmMergeMWLTemplateURI.description: 指定强制从匹配DICOM MWL项目接收的对象的请求属性的样式表URI。 仅当指定"合并MWL匹配关键点"时才有效

dcmMergeMWLSCP.title: 合并MWL SCP
dcmMergeMWLSCP.description: AE Title of MWL SCP to lookup MWL Item used to coerce request attributes of received objects. If it refers a MWL SCP of the own Archive Device, the Archive DB is directly queried for a matching MWL item. If it refers an external MWL SCP, 外部MWL SCP的AE标题,用于查找用于强制接收对象的请求属性的MWL项目. If absent, the Archive DB is queried for a matching MWL items provided by any Archive MWL AE.

dcmMergeLocalMWLWorklistLabel.title: Merge Local MWL Worklist Label
dcmMergeLocalMWLWorklistLabel.description: Only consider MWL items with one of the specified values of its Worklist Label (0074,1202) in the Archive DB to coerce request attributes of received objects. If absent, the Archive DB is queried for matching MWL items with any Worklist Label (0074,1202).

dcmMergeLocalMWLWithStatus.title: Merge Local MWL With Status
dcmMergeLocalMWLWithStatus.description: Only consider MWL items with one of the specified Scheduled Procedure Step Status codes. If absent, MWL items with any Scheduled Procedure Step Status are considered.

dcmMWLImportFilterBySCU.title: 合并MWL Filter by SCU
dcmMWLImportFilterBySCU.description: 将指定的筛选器从matches返回到外部MWL SCP.

dcmLeadingCFindSCP.title: 第一C-FIND SCP
dcmLeadingCFindSCP.description: 外部C-FIND SCP的AE标题,用于强制属性,具有从该AE中提取的患者属性和检查属性。 如果没有为C-FIND SCP指定特定的属性集,则会提取配置的患者和检查属性过滤器的所有属性

dcmAttributeUpdatePolicy.title: 属性更新策略
dcmAttributeUpdatePolicy.description: 指定如何使用从第一个C-FIND SCP获取的属性来更新属性。 Refer Attribute Update Policies meanings

dcmTrimISO2022CharacterSet.title: Trim ISO 2022 Character Set
dcmTrimISO2022CharacterSet.description: Replace single code for Single-Byte Character Sets with Code Extensions by code for Single-Byte Character Sets without Code Extensions. Only effective with DIMSE = C_STORE_RQ and DICOM Transfer Role = SCU.

dcmUseCallingAETitleAs.title: 使用调用AET
dcmUseCallingAETitleAs.description: 如果属性不存在或为空,则标识要设置为“调用AET”值的属性。ScheduledStationAETitle (= Scheduled Station AE Title (0040,0001) in item of Scheduled Procedure Step Sequence (0040,0100)), SendingApplicationEntityTitleOfSeries (= Sending Application Entity Title of Series (7777,xx37)).

dcmNullifyTag.title: 空属性标签
dcmNullifyTag.description: 用于空的DICOM属性标签的十六进制字符串

dcmMergeAttribute.title: 合并属性
dcmMergeAttribute.description: {attributeID}={value}合并DICOM属性。{value}中的{attributeID}将替换为原始数据集中该属性的值。 例如:InstitutionName=RegionalHospital或00081040=XRay。

dcmNullifyIssuerOfPatientID.title: null患者ID的发行者
dcmNullifyIssuerOfPatientID.description: null患者ID的发行者（0010,0021）和患者ID的发行者修饰符序列（0010,0024）。

dcmIssuerOfPatientID.title: 患者ID发布者
dcmIssuerOfPatientID.description: 患者ID(0010,0021)发行人，和患者ID限定符序列(0010,0024)的颁发者针对接收到的对象中的值的项目的通用实体的ID(0040,0032)的可选值以及通用实体ID类型(0040,0033)相匹配，如果患者ID发行人为空，则设置为MATCHING or NOT_MATCHING。格式: <Issuer of Patient ID> [& <Universal Entity ID> & <Universal Entity ID Type>]。

dcmIssuerOfPatientIDFormat.title: 患者ID发布者格式
dcmIssuerOfPatientIDFormat.description: 从其他属性导出的患者ID发布者格式。 例如“{00100010,hash}-{00100030}”：使用以“-”分隔的患者姓名和出生日期散列值。要强制接收对象的患者ID发布者的现有值,还必须相应地设置"null患者ID发布者。

dcmSupplementFromDeviceReference.title: 从设备补充
dcmSupplementFromDeviceReference.description: 接收的复合对象和分配给MPPS的权限或其他信息用于补充的设备的名称。
